name: Timeline
description: Interactive chronological timeline. Ideal for historical events, process steps, and biographical content.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate timeline events with dates

events.startDate: string - Start date (YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD)
events.headline: string - Event title
Robert Hooke discovers cells
events.text: Robert Hooke observed cork under a microscope and coined the term 'cell' to describe the small compartments he saw.

events.headline: Schleiden's plant cell theory
events.text: Matthias Schleiden proposed that all plants are made of cells.

events.headline: Schwann's animal cell theory
events.text: Theodor Schwann extended the cell theory to animals, stating all animals are composed of cells.

events.headline: Virchow's cell division theory
events.text: Rudolf Virchow proposed that all cells come from pre-existing cells (Omnis cellula e cellula).

conversion_notes.date_formats: YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD formats accepted
conversion_notes.headline_structure: H5P headline is an object with headline and text properties
